entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Tillsonburg
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:14 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening and ending later this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
